abstract: William Lewis, a longtime News Corporation insider, had been the Dow Jones division’s acting chief since Les Fenwick resigned in January.
snippet: William Lewis, a longtime News Corporation insider, had been the Dow Jones division’s acting chief since Les Fenwick resigned in January.
lead_paragraph: William Lewis, who has served as acting chief executive of News Corporation’s Dow Jones division since January, has been named its permanent chief, the company announced on Thursday.

headline.main: Dow Jones Acting Chief Is Given Job Permanently
headline.print_headline: Dow Jones Acting Chief Is Given Job Permanently
